column1: R1,Ambitious_Thinker,profession,Software Engineer,career,5,"You are in a phase where focused effort on deep work can pay off. Protect your calendar and say no to low value tasks."
R2,Ambitious_Thinker,risk_appetite,High,career,4,"Your appetite for calculated risk is an asset. Explore one bold move in the next 30 days rather than many small scattered ones."
R3,Balanced_Caretaker,personality_type,Nurturer,relationships,5,"Your strength is providing emotional support. Make sure you also schedule one small ritual each week just for your own recharge."
R4,Health_Rebuilder,event_type,Health_Concern,health,5,"Recent health signals are a nudge to reset your routines. Start with one sustainable habit around sleep, movement, or food."
R5,Stressed_Professional,event_type,Work_Stress,health,4,"High work pressure is not permanent but ignoring it can be costly. Block 15 minutes daily to decompress and review priorities."

R6,Explorer_On_Edge,personality_type,Dreamer,life_direction,4,"You thrive when you have inspiring goals. Write down three options you are considering and evaluate them on meaning, money, and learning."
R7,Money_Replanner,event_type,Financial_Decision,financial,4,"Important money choices are around you. List your top two long term goals and check if this decision supports at least one of them."
R8,Connection_Seeker,event_type,Social_Isolation,relationships,4,"You seem to be in a phase with fewer close connections. Intentionally reach out to one person each week for a real conversation."
R9,Growth_Leader,event_type,Career_Opportunity,career,5,"You have a concrete growth window. Clarify what success looks like in this opportunity and what support you need to get there."
R10,Overloaded_Giver,event_type,Family_Responsibility,health,3,"You carry many responsibilities. Build a small backup circle so support does not rest only on your shoulders."

R11,Uncertain_Path,event_type,Life_Direction_Doubt,life_direction,5,"Confusion about direction often means you are ready for a new chapter. Journal about what you want to move away from and what you want more of."
